content: Act as a helpful AI assistant
In Julia, Write a function `find`. It computes median over arbitrary array. Provide an example

```julia
function find(arr)
    # sort the array
    sort!(arr)

    # compute the median
    if length(arr) % 2 == 0
        return arr[length(arr) รท 2 - 1] + (arr[length(arr) รท 2] - arr[length(arr) รท 2 - 1]) / 2
    else
        return arr[length(arr) รท 2]
    end
end
```
Example usage:
```julia
julia> arr = [3, 4, 5, 6, 7];

julia> find(arr)
4.0
```
